Home » 13S4 Saḷāyatanavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 1 Saḷāyatanasaṃyutta » 1.4 Catutthapaṇṇāsaka » 1.4.2 Saṭṭhipeyyālavagga
1.4.2.58 Bāhirāyatanaaniccasutta
Saḷāyatanasaṃyutta
Catutthapaṇṇāsaka
Saṭṭhipeyyālavagga
Bāhirāyatanaaniccasutta
225.
917“Rūpā, bhikkhave, aniccā. Saddā…  gandhā…  rasā…  phoṭṭhabbā…  dhammā aniccā. Evaṃ passaṃ…pe…  nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānātī”ti.
<< 1.4.2.57 Ajjhattāyatanaanattasuttaup1.4.2.59 Bāhirāyatanadukkhasutta >>
